item.title: Witkoff Plans Visit to Gaza to See Hunger Crisis
item.description: Steve Witkoff met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and was expected to visit an aid distribution site in the enclave.

item.title: Kamala Harris Sells a Memoir About the 2024 Campaign
item.description: The former vice president has written a book about her run for president in 2024. It will come out next month.

item.title: How Does the Robin Hood Foundation Fight Trump Budget Cuts Without Saying ‘Trump’?
item.description: The Robin Hood Foundation, one of New York City’s biggest charities, is navigating tensions between its wealthy donors and the nonprofits it funds.

item.title: New Implant Offers Hope for Easing Rheumatoid Arthritis
item.description: The device stimulates the vagus nerve, signaling the body to tamp down the inflammation that contributes to the disease.

item.title: Modi’s ‘True Friend’ Trump Deals India a Big Blow With Tariff Threats
item.description: India’s prime minister has made a big effort to build closer ties using his rapport with the U.S. president, but critics say he is getting little in r...
